meanings.sent1: The bride wore a beautiful dentelle veil on her wedding day.
meanings.sent2: She added a touch of elegance to her dress with a dentelle collar.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the dentelle curtains, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: The morning dew clung to the dentelle fabric like tiny sparkling diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The intricate dentelle design on the tablecloth caught everyone's eye at the party.

meanings.definition: A decorative trim or edging made of lace
meanings.sent1: The antique dress was adorned with a delicate dentelle trim.
meanings.sent2: The curtains in the room had a lovely dentelle border that added charm.
meanings.sent3: She sewed a dentelle edging on the pillowcase as a special touch.
meanings.sent4: The dentelle ribbon on the gift box made it look extra special.
meanings.sent5: The dentelle lace on the hem of the skirt swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.definition: To decorate or trim with lace or lace-like patterns
meanings.sent1: She decided to dentelle her dress for the costume party.
meanings.sent2: The designer chose to dentelle the sleeves of the blouse for a unique look.
meanings.sent3: He playfully tried to dentelle his shoelaces, but it didn't turn out well.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush seemed to dentelle the canvas with intricate lace patterns.
meanings.sent5: The baker used icing to dentelle the cake, creating a beautiful lace effect.
